Upcoming Important Dates 
May 1, 2023
Housing license agreement deadline for incoming first-year students who are required to live on campus.
May 12, 2023
9-month residence halls and apartments close for the academic year at 10 a.m.
JULY 17, 2023
Residence hall cancellation deadline for fall 2023 due to Office of Housing Administration
